title: Shahid Buttar on Running Against Nancy Pelosi, Kente Cloth, and Police Reform
description:
Shahid Buttar returns to the show to talk about his campaign against Nancy Pelosi, police reform, civil liberties and more. Matt and Katie look at the significance of Kente cloth, and discuss the recent turmoil in major newsrooms around the country
Merch Link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
